title: Mobile Suit Gundam I
title_jp: 劇場版　機動戦士ガンダム I　特別編
synopsis: It is the year Universal Century 0079. Over 90 million people now populate the Earth and have been forced to live in space. People now live in large cylinder like colony clusters called Sides, all ruled over the Earth Federation Space Force (E.F.S.F.). Then, a group of colonies near the dark side of the moon, called Side 3, proclaimed themselves independent from the Earth Federation and called themselves the Principality of Zeon.
